name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: It might be a hardware thing? In which case, either bust open the mouse and fix it, or get a new one. Do you have a spare you can borrow to test the theory and isolate the problem?

source_obj.text: It might be a hardware thing? In which case, either bust open the mouse and fix it, or get a new one. Do you have a spare you can borrow to test the theory and isolate the problem?
